title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Negotiated Learning for Digital Literacy and Self-Directed Learning Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with ICT tools and foundational knowledge in mathematics
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously select and utilize digital tools during the mathematical problem-solving process.
Learners can collaboratively negotiate with peers to set mathematical learning goals and efficiently allocate digital resources.
Learners can apply digital literacy on online platforms to explore and present real-world applications of mathematical concepts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
